text: Hey friends, we are going to be cautious about the weather tomorrow. Will keep an eye on things but it is quite likely we will get a late start or have a supermajority of work from home activity. Please let us know if you are planning on coming into the office!
John, thanks for the note. I will plan on coming in late tomorrow and if ok have a meeting there tomorrow night from 7-9 pm with two people and myself, if weather permits.
